nl.naturalis.oaipmh.rest

Class Registry

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.naturalis.oaipmh.rest.Registry

  • public class Registry
extends Object
    Class responsible for configuring the REST service.
    Author:
    Ayco Holleman

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) static String CONFIG_FILE_NAME
      Name of the central configuration file for the OAIPMH REST service (oaipmh.properties).

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Get a ConfigObject for the main configuration file (oaipmh.properties).

      Returns a Registry instance.

    • Field Detail

      • CONFIG_FILE_NAME

        static final String CONFIG_FILE_NAME
        Name of the central configuration file for the OAIPMH REST service (oaipmh.properties).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public static void initialize()
        Instantiates and initializes a Registry instance. This method must be called before servicing any request. If anything goes wrong while initializing the Registry, an ApplicationInitializationException is thrown and the application dies already during startup. An explanation of what went wrong is written to the Wildfly log (standalone/log/server.log).

      • getInstance

        public static Registry getInstance()
        Returns a Registry instance. Will call initialize() first.
        Returns:
        A Registry instance.

      • getConfig

        public org.domainobject.util.ConfigObject getConfig()
        Get a ConfigObject for the main configuration file (oaipmh.properties).
        Returns:

      • getConfDir

        public File getConfDir()
        Get the directory designated to contain the application's configuration files. This directory will contain at least oaipmh.properties, but may contain additional files that the application expects to be there.
        Returns:
